title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 72.7 - Notification of award
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 72.7 - Notification of award

State Regulations

Following the deadline for submission of applications as
established by the department, the department shall provide timely written
notification of awards to applicants. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
72.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
